import Rhino.Geometry as rg
import math

if __name__ == "__main__":
    circle = rg.Circle(center, radius)
    curve = circle.ToNurbsCurve()
    params = curve.DivideByCount(division, True)
    
    circles = []
    for t in params:
        pt = curve.PointAt(t)
        circles.append(rg.Circle(pt, (2 * math.pi * radius / division) * 0.5))
        
    a = circles
